name: Bingo (tpAtAll)
description:
A simple singleplayer bingo game I made in 1.5 weeks, where I tested some old and new functionality in.

You can choose to play with 1-3 cards and you can keep going until you collect 1-36 (all) bingos, There is a timer and it will display your final time at the end but it is basically optional.

Also has simple sound settings for music and SFX, a credits page on the main menu, and a pause/quit button.
